problems.title: Maximize Number of Nice Divisors (Number Theory)
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer primeFactors. You are asked to construct a positive integer n such that the number of prime factors of n is at most primeFactors, and the number of nice divisors of n is maximized.
Return the number of nice divisors of n modulo 10^9 + 7.

Input Format:
First line: integer primeFactors.

Output Format:
Print a single integer.
hintsList: Maximize the product of exponents summing to primeFactors.
